document.docAuthor: Mojica, José Ivan & Agudelo-Zamora, Henry D.
document.masterDocTitle: Historical review, catalog of type specimens and online database of the ichthyology collection of the Instituto de Ciencias Naturales of the Universidad Nacional de Colombia (ICN-MHN)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Historical review, catalog of type specimens and online database of the ichthyology collection of the Instituto de Ciencias Naturales of the Universidad Nacional de Colombia (ICN-MHN)

materialsCitation.collectorName: No. & Guayabero & Camp Thompson & G. Dahl
materialsCitation.treatmentCitationGroup:
Pygidium metae guayaberensis
Dahl, 1960a : 307
, fig. 2. Holotype ( Fig. 47 ): ICN-MHN 435 (57.0 mm SL), Colombia , Meta , in a small pond in a brook tributary to the Guayabero River ca . 1 km from the mouth of the brook and
1500 m
from the expedition camp No. 1, situated on the left bank of the Guayabero , ca . 4 km above Camp Thompson ; G. Dahl ,
23 Jan 1959
.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Remarks: Cala (1981) and Mojica & Castellanos (2007 , 2009 ) did not listed the holotype of
Pygidium metae guayaberensis
. The holotype was found in the general collection under a different taxonomic identification, but with the old label intact. Currently as
Ituglanis guayaberensis
.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Pygidium migrans
Dahl, 1960b : 309
, fig. 3. Holotype ( Fig. 48 ): ICN-MHN 399 ( 41.5 mm SL), Colombia, Meta, Guayabero River, tributary of Meta River; G. Dahl, 14 Mar 1959 . Paratypes ICN-MHN 400 (691, 26.3–35.5 mm SL), ICN-MHN 396 (1030, 25.8–36.0 mm SL), collected with the holotype.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Remarks: Cala (1981) indicated that ICN-MHN 400 had 1384 specimens and Mojica & Castellanos (2009) assigned 683 specimens to the same lot. Currently as
Trichomycterus migrans
.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Pygidium totae
Miles, 1942c : 55
, unnumbered figure. Holotype ( Fig. 49 ): ICN-MHN 353 (145.0 mm SL), Colombia , Boyacá , Sogamoso ,
Lago de Tota
, eastern versant, Cordillera Oriental ,
3060 m asl
.; C. Miles & C. L. Winz ,
Feb 1942
. Paratype : ICN-MHN 20a (one head), collected with the holotype
.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Remarks: Cala (pers. comm.) recatalogued ICN-MHN 20 as ICN-MHN 353. The lot SU 37074 corresponds to the posterior half of ICN-MHN 20a ( Schaefer & Fernández, 2009 ). Miles (1942c) wrongly indicated that the holotype measured 130 mm SL, while Mojica & Castellanos (2007) gave a standard length of 353 mm SL, being clearly a mistake with the catalog number of the holotype . We verified the standard length of the specimen using ImageJ ( Rasband, 2016 ). Currently as
Rhizosomichthys totae
.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Trichomycterus gorgona
Fernández & Schaefer, 2005 : 69
, fig. 1. Paratype ( Fig. 50 ): ICN-MHN 10019 ( 58.7 mm SL), Colombia , Cauca , Pacífic Sea , Isla Gorgona , freshwater stream near NE end of island, Argosy Ecuador Expedition station 29, 02°59’N 78°11’30”W ; Argosy Ecuador Expedition,
21 Sep 1961
.

subSubSection.paragraph: Remarks: the paratype was donated from ANSP (Arrindell Radford pers. comm.).
